short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your personal workout on Garmin Connect with other users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add share/import capabilities to the Garmin Connect website. Sharing you workout becomes really easy.

Simply create your personal workout as always and click on the "Download" button inside the page. 

Send the json file to your friends to let them import it in their Garmin Connect profile.
long.it:
Add share/import capabilities to the Garmin Connect website. Sharing you workout becomes really easy.
Simply create your personal workout as always and click on the "Download" inside the page. Send the json file to your friends to let them import it in their Garmin Connect profile.
